TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NavigationWindow extends System.Windows.Window implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class NavigationWindow Inherits Window Implements IUriContext

type NavigationWindow = class inherit Window interface IUriContext

summary.span: 表示支持内容导航的窗口。

span.span: Represents a window that supports content navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 ，并将其扩展为导航到并显示内容的功能。 derives from and extends it with the ability to navigate to and display content. 内容可以是任何 .NET Framework 对象或 HTML 文件。Content can be any .NET Framework object or HTML file. 但一般情况下， 对象是打包内容以便导航的首选方式。In general, however, a object is the preferred way to package content for navigation. 通过使用所需内容的 URI 设置 属性，可以导航到内容。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，还可以使用 方法的以下重载之一导航到内容：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 按 URI 导航到内容后， 将返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. > [!NOTE] > 导航依据 URI 还支持导航到内容片段。Navigation by URI also supports navigation to a content fragment. 请参阅 。See . 此外，还可以通过使用接受对象的 方法重载之一来导航内容：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 导航的生存期可通过以下事件进行跟踪：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 。. 并非每次发生导航时都会引发所有事件;引发的事件集由发生的导航类型（内容或内容片段）以及导航完成方式（取消、停止或失败）决定。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了这些事件将激发的顺序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 导航期间或之后 提供有关要导航到的内容的信息，其中包括要导航到的内容的 URI （）、当前内容的 URI （）以及包含的内容的对象导航到（）。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 导航至内容时， 会将导航记录为导航历史记录中的条目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 当出现新的导航时，通过调用 方法，或者通过调用 导航到前进导航历史记录中的条目，可以将条目添加到后退导航历史记录中。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 通过导航到后退导航历史记录中的条目（通过调用 ），将条目添加到前进导航历史记录中。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和 报告是否分别包含向后导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录中的条目。 and report whether there are entries in backward and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次从另一段内容导航到一个内容时， 会自动显示允许用户在导航历史记录中来回导航的导航用户界面。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forwards through navigation history. 可以通过设置 "" 属性来配置显示导航 UI 的时间。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 可以通过调用 来移除后退导航历史记录中的最新条目。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不会在导航历史记录中存储内容对象的实例。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，每次使用导航历史记录导航到内容对象时， 都将创建该对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免在将大量内容导航到时消耗过多的内存。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，不会从一个导航到下一个导航来记住内容的状态。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不过，WPF 提供了多种方法，通过这些方法，你可以在导航历史记录中存储一段内容的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用 ，还可以记住单个页面实例的多个状态集。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 是 WPF 中的两个导航器之一，另一个则是 。 is one of two navigators in WPF, the other being . 从本质上讲，导航器是一个支持导航和导航历史记录的类。Essentially, navigator is a class supports navigation and navigation history. 直观地 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航器来提供集成的用户体验。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 但 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 实际上使用 作为导航器;在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 中运行的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] 的 属性将返回对 的引用，并且由 管理的导航历史记录与 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]管理的导航历史记录集成。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]. **内容模型：** 是 ，这意味着 可以包含文本、图像或面板等内容。**Content Model:** is a , which means that can contain content such as text, images, or panels. 此外， 是根元素，因此，不能是另一个元素的内容的一部分。Also, is a root element and, consequently, cannot be part of another element's content. 有关 的内容模型的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 内容模型](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md)。For more information about the content model for , see [WPF Content Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md). ## 自定义 System.windows.navigation.navigationwindow> 控件Customizing the NavigationWindow Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[System.windows.navigation.navigationwindow> 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [NavigationWindow Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 。The following example shows how to create a . MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxExternalContent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否在一个部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认 Internet 区域权限集）内隔离外部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with default Internet zone permission set).

value.span: 如果在一个部分信任的安全沙盒中隔离内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部内容是应用程序不包含在资源文件或内容文件中的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容（有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)）。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (for more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 如果 为 true，并且 的内容是外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 文件，则会将内容加载到仅限默认 Internet 区域权限集的部分信任的安全沙盒中。When is true, and the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default Internet zone permission set. 此外，外部内容会加载到单独的进程中。Additionally, the external content is loaded into a separate process. 因此，外部内容将被隔离，并且无权访问应用程序范围的资源，例如资源字典（有关详细信息，请参阅 ）。Consequently, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (for more information, see ). > [!NOTE] > 仅当 属性设置为外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 文件的统一资源标识符（URI）时， 才包含外部内容。 contains external content only when the property is set to the uniform resource identifier (URI) for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用 属性提供 内容被视为内部内容，并且随后不会被隔离。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

exception.span: 当应用程序在部分信任的环境中执行时，将设置 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此 `ShouldSerialize` 方法的原因是 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要为 开发设计器或开发包含 的自己的控件，通常需要调用此方法。You typically call this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了帮助向后和向前导航， 自动显示导航 UI。To aid backward and forward navigation, automatically displays a navigation UI. 无论是否发生了导航，都将显示导航 UI。The navigation UI is displayed whether or not navigation has occurred. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 获取或设置当前内容的统一资源标识符 (URI)，或当前正在导航到的新内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.

value.span: 当前内容或当前正在导航到的内容的 URI。

span.span: The URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 。See . > [!NOTE] > 统一资源标识符（Uri）可以是相对的，也可以是绝对的。Uniform resource identifiers (URIs) can be either relative or absolute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过设置 属性导航到统一资源标识符（URI）。The following example shows how to navigate to a uniform resource identifier (URI) by setting the property. [!code-csharp[HOWTONavigationSnippets#NavigateToPageSrcCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#navigatetopagesrccode)] [!code-vb[HOWTONavigationSnippets#NavigateToPageSrcCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#navigatetopagesrccode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
